text: Did HubSpot stop allowing forms to get pre-filled with javascript? We were doing this for multiple clients and now submissions are suddenly missing the values.
I want to know how i can trigger the chat widget visibility/behaviour on button click, like i dont want the widget to always appear on pageload, it should appear when one clicks on the help button

Should still work, but you do need to make sure the form is loaded on the page before manipulating it. The best way to do this in my opinion is via global form events and listening for a ‘formReady’ message.

Hey Samuel, when editing your chatflow, click on the Display tab at the top, then click on “Chat display behavior”. For both the Desktop and Mobile tabs, set the behavior to “Only show the chat launcher”.

If you want to trigger the chat via a button other than the default chat trigger, you can use the <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/conversations_api/widget_open|open method>.
Hi <@UGY6JNTB4> thank you, this has been helpful!
